Posts.Content: ajhunt wrote: Hi, Has anyone heard about a test that checks circulating tumor cells?  My doctor has mentioned it to me but I'm not sure what the real benefit might be.  Can someone let me know their thoughts? Thanks so much. Amanda  Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Dec 1, 2009 02:19PM ajhunt wrote: Have you or your doctor personally found any benefit to having your CTC counts?   Does it give you any more confidence about your choices or have you changed treatments because of it? Thanks so much for getting back to me Faith.  Just unsure as to what it would do for me, (Other than lose a few hours in a chair!)
